title: #145: Behavioral Insight From "The Staircase'
description:
Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti continue to discuss Jim and Laura's analysis of Kathleen Peterson's death and Michael Peterson's behaviour in @netflix show "The Staircase." Laura highlights high risk behaviours in the relationship, testimony from those who know them the best behind closed doors and Jim and Laura discuss other similar cases.


#HerNameWasKathleenPeterson

#TheStaircase


THIS IS EPISODE IS SPONSORED BY

THE WEATHER CHANNEL-

Be sure to see the new series STORM OF SUSPICION.

The show examines the role weather takes in covering up a crime or uncovering who committed a crime. Featuring Dr. Elizabeth Austin, a guest on a future episode of Real Crime Profile.

Premiering Sunday October 7, 2018 at 8pm E, 7pm C on The Weather Channel.



Also Sponsored by

MADISON REED

Reinventing the way women color their hair.

Go to Madison-Reed.com and use Promocode CRIME for 10% off plus free shipping on your first color kit.
